price: 22. donde vivirán eternamente. Ciertamente, la recompensa de Al-lah es inmensa.
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدًاۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ عِندَهُۥٓ أَجۡرٌ عَظِيمٞ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhā abadan inna al-laha ʿindahu ajrun ʿaẓīmun
